entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: University of Victoria 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: 6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near Haro Strait this afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low 7 with temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near Haro Strait overnight. Low 7 with temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
